definition: to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend

sentences.english: The result showed that the natural dustfall accounted for 54% of the total dust amount yearly.
sentences.chinese: 經分析，蘭州城區自然降塵量佔年降塵量的54%。

sentences.english: The result showed that the natural dustfall accounted for 54% of the total dust amount yearly.
sentences.chinese: 經分析，蘭州城區自然降塵量佔年降塵量的54%。

sentences.english: Can be used to decrease the dust , moisten the air .
sentences.chinese: 具備噴霧降塵功能，適宜降塵，溼潤空氣。

sentences.english: Can be used to decrease the dust , moisten the air .
